title: Years ago the farthest North you could drive on Wrightsville Beach was the parking area on the north side, adjacent to the Holiday Inn.  It was then water from there to Figure 8 island.  Then over the years, the ocean filled in this area with sand from the parking area to the Resort at the Northernmost end of Wrightsville Beach.  What determined who owned all the land that is now filled with houses?
